mapper.update:
update users

company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
